あ 機械はあたしにまかせて！: Ah, leave the machines to me!
チョイチョイってやっつけちゃうから: ...and take care of them easily and quickly.
タイトル ないようふんしょうの構成: Title, composition of the content paragraphs.
アイテムの中には{Yellow} 【手榴弾】{White} のように: Among the items, there are those like {Yellow} [Hand Grenade]{White}
バトル中に特殊な効果を持つものがあります: that have special effects during battle.
こうしたアイテムは{Yellow} 【特殊】{White} の一種である{Yel: These items are a type of {Yellow} [Special]{White}, which are {Yellow} [Use]{White}.
アビリティで バトル中にのみ使うことができます: It can only be used during battle using an Ability.
空の敵は{Wakka} の[40+48?]当よ: The enemies in the sky are {Wakka}'s [40+48?] target.
さっき教えたでしょう: I just taught you that, didn't I?
そいつは魔法で倒したほうがいいの: Is it better to defeat that one with magic?
ちっ！ しとめそこなった！: Tsk! I failed to finish it!
一発じゃ倒せねえな: I can't defeat it in one hit.
あんたがやるだけムダ: It's pointless for you to try.
あの子にまかせたら？: Should we leave it to her?
やっぱ こいつはオレじゃ: After all, this one isn't for me...
私が かたづけるわ: I will take care of it.
オレらの相手じゃないだろ: They aren't our opponent, are they?
飛んでる敵の相手はオレだろ？: I handle the flying enemies, right?
やっぱり私じゃムリかしら: I wonder if I can't do it after all.
魔法を使えば 一撃ね: If we use magic, it will be one hit.
ザコはガードにまかせて: Leave the small fry to the guard.
せっかくだ！ 招喚士様に: Since we have the chance! To the Summoner,
いいとこ見せてもらおうぜ！: Let's have them show us something good!
初の実戦ってやつだ: The first real battle, that's what this is.
修業の成果 見せてちょうだい: Show me the results of your training.
参加していないキャラクターと交代できます: You can switch with characters who are not participating.
交代してバトルに参加したキャラクターは すぐに行動できます: Characters who switch into battle can act immediately.
{White} バトル中に{Yellow} 【招喚】{White} コマンドを使: By using the {Yellow} [Summon] {White} command during battle.
{Yuna} に力を貸す招喚獣をバトルに[40+49?]び出せます: You can call forth Summons that lend their power to {Yuna} into battle.
【招喚】コマンドは{Yuna} のみが持つ特殊能力で: The [Summon] command is a special ability possessed only by {Yuna}.
招喚獣はダメージを受けるとHPが減ります: When Summons receive damage, their HP decreases.
HPが0になるとバトルから消えてしまい: If HP reaches zero, they will disappear from battle...
しばらくの間 [40+49?]び出せなくなります: For a while, you will be unable to call [40+49?] out.
招喚獣のHPはセーブスフィアで回復します: A summon's HP recovers at a Save Sphere.
デカイのが再登場かよ: The huge one is back again?
{Yuna} はしばらく招喚できないわ！: {Yuna} cannot be summoned for a while!
今[40+48?]はオレがキメる番だな: Now [40+48?] it's my turn to settle this, huh.
オレのワザで『暗闇』にしてやるっ！: I'll use my technique to make it 'Darkness'!
どうしよう……まだ招喚できない！: What should I do... I still can't summon!
